channel.title: Team pking?!Delta 317 will rep!
channel.description:
Hey,so recently i was checking on other servers for ideas.I came accross one with a thing called 'bloodlust'.Its basically,pkers go in teams,kill each other and it rewards them pk points,and announces a message the the team saying: 1. Who you killed. 2. What team he is in, and what team you gained points for. 3. How much PKP you received.
I want it to be in clans (i got ::ccjoin,::cm system,all that)and basically,i want to a clan to be able 2 go in wildy,not be able 2 kill each other,but kill other clans and then it sends a message to your own clan,saying who you killed.
I have no idea at all how to do this,so any help is totally appreciated. im delta 317

item.title: Team pking?!Delta 317 will rep!
item.dc:creator: @lord_fear lord_fear
item.description:

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/220638-castle-wars-delta.html

Tutorial for castle wars.
And since you are using delta, It should be easily added without any errors <3

Just realised this isn’t complete, Add me on msn and i will help you with the rest
Jordanscott66@hotmail.com

Hey,so recently i was checking on other servers for ideas.I came accross one with a thing called ‘bloodlust’.Its basically,pkers go in teams,kill each other and it rewards them pk points,and announces a message the the team saying:

  1. Who you killed.
  2. What team he is in, and what team you gained points for.
  3. How much PKP you received.

I want it to be in clans (i got ::ccjoin,::cm system,all that)and basically,i want to a clan to be able 2 go in wildy,not be able 2 kill each other,but kill other clans and then it sends a message to your own clan,saying who you killed.

I have no idea at all how to do this,so any help is totally appreciated.
